title: Boosting ethylene yield via a synergistic 2D/0D nanostructured VCu layered double hydroxide/TiO2 catalyst in electrochemical CO2 reduction
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00417E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sneha S. Lavate, Rohit Srivastava
A VCu LDH/TiO2 nanocomposite showed high catalytic efficiency in CO2 electrochemical reduction, achieving superior faradaic efficiency for ethylene production, highlighting potential for scalable CO2-to-energy conversion processes.
